remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and pippali churna improves breathing and reduces cough. Studies show 86-96% relief in symptoms.
remedy.dosage: 65–125 mg twice daily with honey for 21–30 days.
remedy.anupana: Honey or madhu + pippali churna + talisadi churna.
remedy.cautions: Not during acute infection; monitor respiratory status. Avoid in severe asthma attacks.
remedy.research: Clinical studies show significant improvement in PEF rates and breath holding time.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and herbal powders relieves chronic cough and throat irritation.
remedy.dosage: 65 mg twice daily with honey for 21 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor for underlying conditions; avoid in acute infections.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with madhu and herbal powders reduces organ size and relieves symptoms. Studies show up to 65% reduction in organ size.
remedy.dosage: 65–250 mg twice daily with honey for up to 45 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor liver/spleen size via ultrasound and lab tests. Regular liver function tests required.
remedy.research: Clinical studies show significant reduction in organ size and improvement in symptoms.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and digestive herbs improves absorption and digestive function.
remedy.dosage: 65–250 mg twice daily with honey for 30 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor weight and nutritional status. Check for underlying conditions.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and cooling herbs reduces acidity and improves digestion.
remedy.dosage: 25 mg once daily after meals for 21–30 days.
remedy.cautions: Avoid in peptic ulcers without digestive indication; monitor acidity.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma (plain or STB) lowers lipids and supports weight management. Somnathi Tamra Bhasma (STB) shows stronger effects.
remedy.dosage: 30 mg twice daily for 21–30 days (STB: 75 mg BD).
remedy.cautions: Accompany with diet and exercise; monitor lipid profile.
remedy.research: Animal studies show significant anti-hyperlipidemic and cardio-protective effects.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma enhances hematopoiesis when used with hematinic herbs.
remedy.dosage: 25 mg twice daily with honey and iron-rich herbs.
remedy.anupana: Honey + power of Punarnava or Lohasava.
remedy.cautions: Check CBC; avoid if iron overload is suspected.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and skin-friendly herbs improves skin conditions.
remedy.dosage: 15–25 mg twice daily with honey for 30 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor skin reactions; avoid in severe infections.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with honey and ghee supports healing and reduces bleeding.
remedy.dosage: 15 mg BD with honey and ghee internally; apply medicated ghee externally.
remedy.cautions: Stop if excessive bleeding; monitor stools.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with bitter herbs helps manage blood sugar levels.
remedy.dosage: 15–25 mg twice daily with honey for 30 days.
remedy.anupana: Honey + bitter gourd juice + neem powder.
remedy.cautions: Monitor blood sugar regularly; continue prescribed medications.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with diuretic herbs helps reduce fluid accumulation.
remedy.dosage: 25–50 mg twice daily with honey for 30 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor fluid balance; check for underlying liver/heart conditions.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with anti-parasitic herbs helps eliminate intestinal parasites.
remedy.dosage: 15–25 mg twice daily with honey for 21 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor for parasite elimination; check stool tests.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma induces mild vomiting to expel toxins.
remedy.dosage: 50 mg once in morning with warm water.
remedy.cautions: Not in dehydration; resume rehydration immediately.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with bitter gourd juice can relieve pain and may reduce stones.
remedy.dosage: 15 mg BD with 20 mL karela juice for 30 days.
remedy.cautions: Use under supervision; monitor gallbladder via ultrasound.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with anti-TB herbs supports treatment and improves immunity.
remedy.dosage: 25–50 mg twice daily with honey for 45 days.
remedy.cautions: Use as adjuvant therapy; continue prescribed TB medications.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with skin-friendly herbs may help restore pigmentation.
remedy.dosage: 15–25 mg twice daily with honey for 60 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor skin changes; protect from sun exposure.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with anti-inflammatory herbs reduces joint pain and inflammation.
remedy.dosage: 25 mg twice daily with honey for 30 days.
remedy.cautions: Monitor joint function; continue prescribed medications.

remedy.description: Tamra Bhasma with anti-tumor herbs may help reduce tumor size.
remedy.dosage: 15–25 mg twice daily with honey for 45 days.
remedy.cautions: Use under strict medical supervision; continue prescribed treatments.
